title: Manage an Interchange Agreement
description: Two railroads need to formalize the process of exchanging traffic at a specific interchange point.

tasks.description: Draft an interchange agreement document that specifies the location, liability terms, and data exchange protocols.
Send the draft to the partner railroad for their review and approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: The document is sent for review.

tasks.description: Once both parties agree, configure the system to allow for the electronic exchange of interchange reports (EDI 418) with the partner railroad.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system is set up for data exchange.

tasks.description: Activate the agreement. Now, when cars are exchanged, the system will automatically send and receive electronic interchange records.
tasks.expected_outcome: The interchange process is now automated and governed by the agreement.
